script.name: swiftDialog - Disk Usage
script.notes:
This script uses swiftDialog to present information to an enduser.
Script uses swiftDialog to prompt user to restart using script from Dan Snelson. - https://snelson.us/2022/11/disk-usage-with-swiftdialog-0-0-3/
Edit --infobuttontext and --infobuttonaction to the correct information for your organization Specify the following for Options > Parameter Labels Parameter 4: Script Log Location Parameter 5: Debug Mode [ true (default) | false ] Parameter 6: Expected Duration (in seconds)
